summary: Kika, a cute cosmetologist, prepares Ramon for funeral when he revives. He proposes to the much older Kika who has his dad as lover. Did Ramon's dad murder his mom? What about the escaped rapist and the PSYCHOlogist video reporter?
cast: Verónica Forqué|Peter Coyote|Victoria Abril|Àlex Casanovas|Rossy de Palma|Santiago Lajusticia|Anabel Alonso|Bibiana Fernández|Jesús Bonilla|Karra Elejalde|Manuel Bandera|Charo López|Francisca Caballero|Mónica Bardem|Joaquín Climent|Blanca Li|Claudia Aros|Agustín Almodóvar
keywords: tabloid journalism|escaped prisoner|serial killer|suicide note|murder disguised as suicide
title: Kika
